channel.title: amqp on Canux's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in amqp on Canux's Blog

item.title: Amqp
item.description: AMQP AMQP: Advanced Message Queue Protocol. AMQP是高级消息队列协议．是异步消息传递所使用的应用层协议规范． 常用的开源AMQP框架： https://github.com/rabbitmq https://github.com/apache/kafka https://github.com/apache/activemq
